sentences.en: ...the prosecution's seemingly malicious omission of recorded evidence.
sentences.cn: …控方对在案证据似为恶意的疏略。

sentences.en: Apostrophe: Sign of omission of letter or to show possessive.
sentences.cn: 省略号: 在英文字内表示略去一些字母或表示拥有的符号.

sentences.en: Apparently, the shortage is due to omission in packing.
sentences.cn: 很明显, 货物短缺系包装遗漏所致.

sentences.en: Copies of the lists were posted so that omissions could be corrected.
sentences.cn: 多份名单被张贴出来，以便更正遗漏之处。

sentences.en: Everyone was surprised at her omission from the squad.
sentences.cn: 她未列入该编组使大家感到惊讶。

sentences.en: If anyone has been left out , we apologise for the omission.
sentences.cn: 如果遗漏了某些人, 我们对此深表歉意.

sentences.en: Its omission, asymmetrical reflection are also a form of existence.
sentences.cn: 它的不作为, 不对称反映也是它存在的方式之一.

sentences.en: Next week, she intended to correct that omission.
sentences.cn: 她决意要在下个星期弥补这个过失.

sentences.en: No liability shall be assumed or thereby incurred for error or omission.
sentences.cn: 任何错误或遗漏均不构成或引致任何法律责任.

sentences.en: Put a mark in the margin to show the omission.
sentences.cn: 在页边作个记号表示有遗漏.

sentences.en: Some of these mistakes of commission and omission had emotional components.
sentences.cn: 在“为与不为”之时所犯的错误,有一些具有情绪的成分.

sentences.en: The book is littered with errors of commission and omission.
sentences.cn: 书中充满了对委员会及遗漏的错误.

sentences.en: The conscientious researcher is careful to avoid up the pole and omission.
sentences.cn: 那位一丝不苟的研究人员总是小心谨慎地避免错误或疏漏.

sentences.en: The omission of " for " in this sentence is incorrect.
sentences.cn: 这一句中省略 " for " 是不正确的.

sentences.en: The omission of the girls was unfair.
sentences.cn: 把女孩排除在外是不公平的.

sentences.en: The omission of this chapter from the third edition was a gross oversight.
sentences.cn: 第三版漏印这一章是个大疏忽.

trans.tran_cn: 省略，删节，遗漏，疏忽，[法]不履行法律责任
trans.tran_en: when you do not include or do not do something
